transcript:
Customer: Tumne subah dopahar 1:30 baje ke baad jo tumne isse baat nahi kari hai?
Customer: To phir closer kaise aayega?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Ye meri baat ABD Holiday Private Limited mein ho rahi hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Main Rukhsar baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Chetan ke madhyam se kaise hain?
Executive: Ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Kya batana hai?
Customer: Kya batana hai?
Executive: Haan sir haan.
Executive: Aap bataiye aap kuch problem face kar rahe hain kisi tarike ki sir?
Customer: Mam wo to jab se aapke yahan se login liya hai tab se problem hi ho rakhi hai. Mera payment refund hona tha jo abhi tak nahi hua hai. Aaj maine jo sales person tha aaj usko bhi phone kiya hai. Maine Chetan ko mail bhi dala hai ki mera payment process mere ko refund kar dijiye kyunki main aap aapki company ke sath koi work nahi karna chah raha hu.
Customer: Theek hai? Aur ye baat main pichle 6 mahine se bol raha hu mam. Aur aap aapse request hai agar aap kuch kara payenge to aaj isko kara dijiye mera payment refund kara dijiye.
Executive: Sir dekhiye refund ka to process nahi hai. Refund to possible nahi hai sir.
Customer: To aap phone kaat do phir kya baat karoge aap mere se batao. Kyun nahi hai payment aapne aapne theek hai na main consumer court mein chala jau?
Customer: Jau main court mein? Aapne bola main record kar leta hu aapki aawaz mujhe meri mail mein likh ke de do aur main court chala jata hu. Wahan court mein jawab dena aap kyun nahi karoge? Fraud aapne kiya hai humne nahi kiya hai. Theek hai? Aapki company ne fraud kiya hai.
Customer: Main phir court se le leta hu na paise. Aapko ye dhyan rakhna padega phir kitne lakh rupaye lunga main. Abhi to thousand ki baat chal rahi hai sirf.
Customer: Aap apni karna apni company ko bolo apni takat photo pesh karna phir. Kyunki aapne customer ke sath customer ko aapne bewakoof banaya hai. Aapki team ne bewakoof banaya hai. Theek hai? Aur sun lo dusri baat aapka jo sales manager hai uske bare mein pure aapko pata nahi main kaun baat kar raha hu kahan se baat kar raha hu. Theek hai? Main apne association ke andar pura us bande ki photo jo tumhara banda hai tumhara employee hai. Theek hai? Uski photo aur uske bare mein message likh ke ki koi bhi is bande se koi bhi register na kara IndiaMART mein. To ab mere paas bahut sare option hai. Aap theek hai aap aazad ho main bhi aazad hu.
Customer: Kyunki main pichle 6 mahine se bol raha hu mera payment do payment do aap nahi de rahe ho. Aur aap keh rahe ho ki policy nahi hai. Kyun nahi hai policy? Bewakoof kisne banaya?
Customer: Aapne bewakoof banaya na mere ko? Maine nahi banaya aapko bewakoof. Aapne mujhe kaha ki sir aise hoga aise hoga theek hai kar lo. Mere paas aake tum check leke chale gaye. Mera payment lene ke baad tumhari pehle to sabse pehle jo tumne manager hire kiya tha usse badtameez tha wo. Usne pehle din hi badtameezi kar di thi. Agar main usi din mana kar diya ki main nahi karunga jis bande jis company ke manager ko baat karne ki taleez na ho us manager us company ke sath kaise deal kar legi?
Customer: Secondly mere ko jo jo cheez batai gayi aapki team dwara wo sab galat batai gayi. Sari wrong thi.
Executive: Sir ek baat bataiye agar aap kisi bhi platform pe jayenge kisi bhi company ki services lenge to use karenge na sir? Sir use karenge na?
Customer: Kyun karenge use mujhe batao na 5 din mein jab jo cheez mere se term ek cheez batao main aapko kehta hu ki main koi cheez aapke ghar pe deliver karunga. Theek hai? Aap mere se ye product kharid lijiye. Uske baad jaise hi aapka payment mere paas aata hai main aapko kahunga nahi madam aapko mere ghar pe aana padega aur yahan se utha ke le jana padega.
Customer: Batao kya karoge aap?
Executive: Sir ek achi baat bataiye. Ji mere ko suno suno madam jo maine aapko question kiya na uska jawab dijiye pehle. Aapko maine koi cheez sale karne aaya aur aapko bola ki mam main ye aapke payment kar dijiye main aapke ghar pe delivery karunga. Aur payment mere ko receive hote hi main aapko call pe keh deta hu ya mail pe keh deta hu ki madam nahi nahi aap mere ghar se uthaiye maine ye nahi kaha tha ki aapke ghar pe uthana hai. Aapke ghar pe dene aaunga. Mujhe batao kya karoge?
Customer: Aap professionally baat kar rahe ho na to main professionally jawab puch raha hu aap. Aap bhi mana karoge na aap bologe ki mera payment wapsi kar do bhai sahab. Aisi deal to hui nahi hai.
Executive: Ek baat theek hai aap aapki sawal agar main aapki baat ko logically accept kar leti hu aap bhi meri baat zara ek baar sun liye. Agar aap kisi bhi platform pe jate hain kisi bhi platform pe apart from IndiaMART agar aap kisi Flipkart aur Amazon jaise kisi platform pe bhi jayenge wo bhi aapse time kahenge ki aap ek ek apne 24 ghante mein se ek time dijiye platform ko so that.
Customer: Aapki team ne suniye aapki team ne mere ko 15 din ka commitment kiya tha aur 15 din se pehle hi main payment mang raha hu. First day se mang raha hu jis din se badtameezi ki thi jis din aapko platform ke bare mein puri jankari.
Executive: Agar aap judge kar rahe hain ek baat bataiye sir agar aap judge kar rahe hain services ko hamari ki hamara response kaisa hai aap use karenge na aap May mein hamare paas aaye hain May mein aapne sirf 10 din use kiye hain services ko.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi madam meri baat suniye jab mere ko 15 din ka time diya gaya tha ki 15 din tak aap lead check kar lijiye is tarah se hona hai is wo cheeze koi cheez commitment nahi thi.
Executive: Sir aapne jab sir jab aapne payment kiya tha aapne proposal read kiya tha ek baar aapne dekha tha proposal mein kya likha hua hai aap kisi executive ki baaton pe kyun ja rahe hain aapne proposal accept karke approve kiya tha na aapne read kiya tha.
Customer: Ab court mein main tumhe read karata hu tameez se tumhe bhi tumhare sales officer ko bhi tum read ki tum professionally baat kar rahe ho na legal wali baat kar rahe ho na aap proposal pe aa gaye na main tumhe ye dhyan rakhna mam na lakhon rupaye le liya tumhari company se aapko bhi samajh mein aayega kisi customer ke palle pade the main apni legal team ko bhej raha hu ab tum dekho meri legal team dekhegi. Main ab aap se baat nahi karunga na aapko phone karunga na mujhe phone aana chahiye na mere platform pe lead aani chahiye apni lead apne paas rakhiye main tumhe batata hu kya hota hai. Theek hai? Aur rahi aapki main dekhta hu na phir Haridwar mein kitne aap login bana pate ho nahi. Aap mazak mein le rahe ho na Uttarakhand government main madam main aapko sun lo abhi main association ka head hu yahan pe. Main Uttarakhand government ko email bhej raha hu aapki puri detail bhej raha hu ki is company se kisi bhi ye travel agent ke sath dhokadhadi ho rahi hai wo tumhe samajh mein aa jayega ab tourism board tumhe letter bhejega agar abhi samajh mein nahi aaya to samajh mein aa jayega ki legal process kya hota hai. Theek hai aap mazak mein le rahe ho bahut sari cheeze mujhe lag raha hai na madam 29000 mere liye kuch nahi hai aap rakhiye aapki company kya pata karodo arbo ban jayegi wo banaiye mujhe koi problem nahi hai theek hai mujhe aapki company se bhi problem nahi hai haan aapki company ke employee se bahut problem hai kyunki tameez kisi ko nahi hai aaj tak koi tameezdar dhang se sunne wala banda samjhane wala nahi mila aapke nahi ji aise policy nahi hai aise wapsi hai are mam mere paas jo banda aapka bheja gaya jo tumhari team ka banda mere paas aaya theek hai wo meri photo dikha de dost meri photo dikha ke mere sath photo khichwa ke hamare Haridwar ke do travel agent se payment liya usne theek hai login diya unko wo mera kaam hai kaise band karna hai kaise nahi karna hai na abhi abhi main akela banda hu abhi 100 100 email aayenge aapko ki jo apna account band karne ke liye bolenge main ministry of tourism mein bhi dalunga Uttarakhand board ko bhi dalunga aap wahan baat kariiyega tab samajh mein aayega ki hota kya hai sir agar main ab main to aap se baat karne ke liye call kar rahi hu na aap mujhse bhi tarike se baat kar rahe hain aap mujhse tameez se baat kariye na aap baat karenge na mujhe sir aap mujhse baat karenge na maine aapko call kiya na baat karne ke liye main sun rahi hu na aapki baat maine kya bola suniye aapko bola payment aapne kaha possible nahi hai aap mujhe keh rahe hain ki aapne apne usme padha sir maine aap se ye bhi to kaha hai na maine aap se ye bhi to kaha hai sir agar aap kisi bhi platform pe jayenge to aap utna hi time denge wahan pe aapne services aap May mein hamare paas aaye hain May ke mahine mein aapne 10 din use kiya hai uske baad aapne services ko use nahi kiya 10 din mein dekh liya mam 10 din mein dekh liya mana kar diya mere ko bataya gaya tha ki sir nahi aayega samajh mein aap mana kar dena to maine 10 din use karke band kar diya ab batao kya sir aapko aapko sahi mein lagta hai ki aap se kisi ne kaha ki nahi samajh mein aayega to bata dijiyega aur uske baad sab kuch ho jayega aap apni baat puri rakhenge na madam meri baat suno aap apni baat tarike se sir puri rakhenge na main bhi mere ko bhi meri baat rakhne ka pura mauka denge aap aapke paas aapke paas sales ka number aapke sales team ka contact hai na detail show kar raha hu na kaun sales member tha usko puchiye aur usko ye boliye ki aap office mein jaake tumhare sath baat kare samajh rahe ho meri baat aapka sales executive Haridwar mein baithta hai aap usko boliye ki ABD ke office mein jaiye aur wo wahan baith ke aapko call kare bolna jo jo cheez usi ke phone se agar main ye sab baatein jhoot bol raha hu jitni abhi aap se keh raha hu usi ke phone se aap baat kariye mere sath aur ye sab baatein tab bhi sunai degi aapko usi ke samne ki kya kya jhoot bola gaya kya kya sach bola gaya tab to yakin hoga aap logo ko bolo aapka executive Haridwar mein baitha hua hai aap usko boliye ki mere office pe aaiye jab wo mere office pe aayega to aap suniye madam yahi ek tarika hai agar aapko samajhna hai to agar aap samajhna nahi chahte hain to aap kuch bhi bol sakte ho aapke paas sare right hain aap kuch bhi bol sakte ho to mere paas ek hi baat bol raha hu aapko agar aapko thoda sa bhi lagta hai ki theek hai customer jhoot bol raha hai aapka sales executive sahi hai to aap apna sales executive ko boliye ki us office pe jaiye aur wo aapke sath call kare aapko kyunki aapko main ye baatein bol raha hu kal wo aapko call karega usko phir boliye ki Ajay ji se baat karaiye aur Ajay ji agar ek bhi baat ghuma fira ke bolenge to mam paisa nahi aur paisa le lena mere se commitment kar rahe ho to baat karte hain sari baat ka ek hi sir aap kisi ek baat bataiye aap kisi executive ke commitment pe kyun ja rahe hain aap IndiaMART ke commitment pe jaye na IndiaMART kya aapko offer kar raha hai madam meri baat suno aapne theek hai wo chor hai na tumhara tumne kaha tumhara executive chor hai na main aapko ye keh rahi hu aap mujhe boliye aap mujhe meri mail mein likh ke de dijiye ki hamare executive ne aapko kuch nahi bola aap likh ke do na meri mail pe reply karo na mam ab usme likh do ki hamare executive aaya hi nahi aapke paas main to sapne mein link mil gaya maine aise hi online payment kar di theek hai mere paas CCTV camera bhi hai mere paas footage bhi hai aapke dono ladko ki hai theek hai aur rahi sales executive ki baat to wo khud phone karega IndiaMART ko ki meri jaan mere ko bacha lo mere ko nahi to payment ya wo personal deke jayega payment wo ghar se de hame ya kahin se bhi de ab aapka sales executive dega theek hai ab jo baat aap keh rahe ho na ki sales executive ki baat pe mat jaiye IndiaMART ki jaiye mam represent karne ke liye to aapne koi bheja hi hoga na aap jo baat keh rahi ho aap sari baat mein galat ho agar aapko sahi apni baat sunni hai samajhni hai to aap us ladke ko boliye jo aap se baat kare aur bolna ki meri baat bhi karaye sir main sales team se nahi aati hu mera kaam client servicing hai mera unke sath communication nahi hai sir aapka account jo hai wo Noida 135 se manage hota hai aapka jo account manager hai wo Noida 135 se suno office banne se na customer khush nahi hota hai customer ko service chahiye hoti hai theek hai pehle din se matlab sab log bewakoof bana rahe hain IndiaMART ke 10 aadmiyon ne baat kar li ek aadmi aisa nahi hai ki sir theek hai sir sir aadmiyon ne agar aap se baat kar li hai aapne ek baar bhi socha ki apni services ko thoda sa use kar lu May ke mahine ke baad se aapne use nahi kiya aap agar apni baat rakh rahe hain to sir main tumse Uttarakhand ki service mang raha hu tum mujhe Kerala ki de rahe ho aapko samajh mein aa raha hai baat kar aap mere se baat kar jab meri contract sign nahi maine kaha Uttarakhand se lao kuch nahi chahiye Kerala ki kyun de rahe ho inquiry tum mujhe Haryana ki inquiry kyun de rahe ho madam aap har jagah galat ho mere paas on on portal pe dekh lijiye jab main Uttarakhand ki lead pe baat kar raha hu aapke sath to aap mere ko Haryana Punjab Kerala South ki kyun de rahe ho batao na mere ko aap har jagah galat ho mam ek jagah nahi ho sir dekhiye yahan pe baat galat aur sahi ki nahi hai yahan par baat hai justification ki agar aap keh rahe hain sir dekhiye aapka objection main accept bhi kar lu tab bhi main aap se ye sawal puch sakti hu ki aapne use kyun nahi kiya ek certain time to use karte na ek time period to dete na sir aap services ko isliye nahi kiya ki mere pe other call bekar ki call badha rahe ho aap log mere ko wahan aap dekhiye aapne use kiya aap suniye ek baar aapne use kiya May ke mahine mein theek hai call aur inquiries jo aapko chalu hui hai aani wo chalu hui hai June se May mein aapne services li hai aapne ab aap services lene ke baad mein ek time tak kuch to use karenge na ek mahine nahi pura May ke mahine use karte thoda June use karte tabhi aapki baat samajh mein aati sir maine wo payment aapko kar diya aap return mat karo aapki company ki aukaat nahi hai payment refund karne ki seedhi si baat hai mere ko apna legal tarika apnana padega sorry mam aapne mujhe phone kiya aapko kasht hua uske liye theek hai galti aap manoge nahi koi bhi nahi marega IndiaMART ka banda kyunki ab jo hame karna hoga hum us tarike se paise le lenge theek hai ab main aapke sales executive ko phone kar raha hu usko office bula raha hu nahi to khud IndiaMART ke office jaake usko samajh mein aa jayega ki kya hota hai wo khud hi phone kar lega aapke paas ab hame nahi karna kuch bhi ab IndiaMART wala khud phone karega ki mam payment refund karo main nahi bolunga wo apni pocket se de ya kahin se bhi de wo uski problem hai ab thank you mam aapne call kiya uske liye ji aapne baat hi nahi baat hi nahi li
summary:
Concerns:

- Payment refund not processed yet.

- Claims company made him a fool.

- States the manager was rude.

- States team provided wrong information.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive asked to use the services.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send legal team.

- Customer will contact sales executive.



Alert (If Any):

refund, fraud, complaint, escalation

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, legal, sales executive, services
